snippet: Cutting the tax to 13 percent from 23 percent, effective Aug. 1, is seen as a way to aid small businesses and bolster the tourism sector.
lead_paragraph: Cutting the tax to 13 percent from 23 percent, effective Aug. 1, is seen as a way to aid small businesses and bolster the tourism sector.

headline.main: Greece Wins Concession on Tax for Restaurant Meals
headline.print_headline: Greece Wins Concession on Tax for Restaurant Meals
